hiveArticle.title: Indians are gearing up for Diwali Festival
hiveArticle.body:
Diwali or Deepavali is the biggest of all Hindu festivals and it is a festival of lights celebrated every year. Every street in India will be lightened up either with lights or Diyas. So Indians are gearing up for the Diwali Festival and I would like to show some pictures on just one day before the Diwali.

![IMG_20171018_175404.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmYTG4kNednMskoAZXv3RFCUmVu8695krvQ595evqr8t9J/IMG_20171018_175404.jpg)

![IMG_20171018_191611.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmP1JHTDZwAZDXRv6fC65EdLb2vsQjTFSCBifSd6ZkoXyq/IMG_20171018_191611.jpg)

![IMG_20171018_180002.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmUU3stjYmdXHHvw85JmQdc5kRUL4T14Puc8zGKzTo2nHZ/IMG_20171018_180002.jpg)

![IMG_20171018_180151.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmXqCCeKpB4v9WS2N3VPbj8DVsYtdtRUovuYUdNiL8jk1G/IMG_20171018_180151.jpg)

![IMG_20171018_213746.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmPDtztYxFJruk2drWFmVNLCymfXTSJKLLnUQ7fkujRvxQ/IMG_20171018_213746.jpg)
